meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Eric Raygor Del Scott Rachel Lindgren Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7683.

td.p: Eric Raygor, a pastor from Somerset, Pennsylvania
Del Scott, a data scientist from San Francisco, California
Rachel Lindgren, a fire lookout from Bend, Oregon (whose 3-day cash winnings total $54,200)

tr.td: THE GOLD STANDARD
ONLY GEOGRAPHY
BALLET
SPORTS UPSETS
MISS NOMERS
"EXO"

RachelEric
